import React from 'react'; const ComparableAnalysis = ({ appraisal, properties }) => { return (
{/* Subject Property (left) */}

Subject Property

{appraisal?.address}

{appraisal?.postcode}

  • Type: {appraisal?.property_type || 'N/A'}
  • Bedrooms: {appraisal?.bedrooms || 'N/A'}
  • Floor Area: {appraisal?.floor_area ? `${appraisal.floor_area} sq ft` : 'N/A'}
{/* Selected Comparables Analysis (right) */}

Comparable Analysis

{properties.length > 0 ? (

{properties.length} comparable properties available for analysis.

Select comparable properties to analyze them against your subject property.

) : (

No comparables selected for analysis.
Select comparable properties to analyze them against your subject property.

)}
); }; export default ComparableAnalysis;
